name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Isme: Ethereum, BSC and BTC Wallet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Another me,
Multi-chain wallet in your browser.

Isme is an extension that provides easy access to the web3 world on the Bitcoin and Ethereum ecosystems directly in the browser. A non-custodial wallet that doesn't track any data and gives you full control over your assets!

Your cryptocurrencies should be anywhere, so we built a wallet that is powerful, easy to use, and multi-chain future-proof.

With Isme, users have full control over their digital assets and digital identities.
